projectCardDescription: Analysis & Comparison of Horse's rations for Nutritionists and Sales team, to assist buyers in choosing the right nutritional product.
problem_2: Only available to nutrition team for research use
problem_3: No scope of collaboration to develop best feeding strategies
problem_4: Difficult to sync changes in feed or horse information
problem_5: Information gap b/w Sales and Nutrition team
problem_6: No option to customize charts and reports
solution_1: Build application with focus on UX
solution_2: Make app available to Sales and Nutrition team with smart user access control
solution_3: Web based apps makes collaboration easy
solution_4: Notification system for users to get modification alerts
solution_5: Sales and Nutrition team accessing common data
solution_7: Mobile app with sleek UI and UX
solution_8: Perform & save analysis for future reference
solution_9: Build and test custom diets quickly

projectCardDescription: Powering Agents to undertake offline surveys for client's Customer Experience Management Platform, advancing their reach to remote locations.
problem_1: No scope of conducting web based surveys in remote locations
problem_2: Poor internet major hurdle in conducting mobile based surveys
problem_3: In places with intermittent internet connection, time to conduct surveys increased
problem_4: Authenticity of responses filled by agents
problem_5: Difficult to implement website user behaviour analysis surveys
problem_6: Limited potential of app suite affected client acquisition
solution_1: Build mobile app with offline functioning capabilities
solution_2: Implement timer feature to verify actual time spent on survey
solution_3: Implement screen recording feature to track user behaviour on specific URLs
solution_4: Take bulk responses offline and sync when device online
solution_5: Manage all offline surveys and manage agent response quotas

projectCardDescription: Enabling Cow farm owners to build, analyse and implement best feeding routines to increase cow milk productivity with optimized costs.
problem_1: No existing tool to build feeding strategies for cows
problem_2: Without proper analysis farms may spend beyond budget to increase milk production
problem_3: Risk of feeding diets deficient or excessive in certain nutrients
problem_4: Analysis of feed as root cause not possible when milk production drops
problem_5: No way for client to share their years of experience and research outcomes with farm owners
problem_6: No way for farm owners to confidently choose the right feed for their dairy cattle
problem_7: Web based tools of no use in locations with zero to no internet connectivity
problem_8: Proprietary software too expensive for small farm owners
solution_1: Build an offline first web app
solution_2: Users can analyse existing feed strategies
solution_3: Optimize feed and cost to reach a target milk production
solution_4: Adjust parameters, and visualize their effect in real time
solution_5: Convert client's knowledge into app which can now be shared with their users
solution_6: Sales team can perform analysis, generate reports and share with users who can't access web app

projectCardDescription: Build detalied Image datasets for multiple Machine Vision applications.
problem_1: No public dataset available for custom Computer Vision applications
problem_2: Even if open-source images available, difficult to mimic actual use case conditions
problem_3: Difficult to find free use images for commercial applications
problem_4: Difficult to control quality of open-source images thus limiting the training data
problem_5: Client had Computer Vision ideas for wide variety of animal species. Again, difficult to find images for uncommon species.
problem_6: Client had some images with them but without annotations
problem_7: Client wanted to collect some metadata along with images as well for various ideas
problem_8: Clicking fresh images possible. But cumbersome for users to transfer to Cloud along with metadata
problem_9: Internet connectivity an issue in remote farms where most images would be clicked
solution_1: Build a mobile app with offline image capturing
solution_3: Add metadata while browsing images one by one
solution_4: Implemented Machine Learning based Image Acceptance Algorithm to control quality of input images
solution_5: Web app to allow users to upload old images
solution_6: Web and mobile apps allowed easy collaboration leading to large image datasets very quickly
solution_7: Use same apps for multiple species. Switch seamlessly between species

projectCardDescription: Empower Users to provide critical market insights to companies while earning rewards and benefits.
problem_2: Evaluation of sales channels and franchise stores through the eyes of customer
problem_3: Building an efficient feedback network to improve products and services
problem_4: Big chunk of population with time and potential not able to contribute to economy
solution_1: Develop a product that Incentivises survey undertaking
solution_2: Allows onboarding of users as agents to conduct mystery shopping assignments
solution_3: Let's a company get real-time feedback on its offerings
solution_4: Let's a company optimize and evaluate sales and marketing strategies
solution_5: Let's users work and earn part-time as per their convenience

projectCardDescription: Product allowing Exhibitors and Visitors, easy information exchange, smooth post-exhibition data access, and optimized lead generation.
problem_1: Brochure printing huge wastage of resources for Exhibitors
problem_2: Printed brochures pile up quickly and become too cumbersome for exhibition visitors to manage
problem_3: Difficult to retrieve information from brochures when needed in future
problem_4: Making notes and remembering interactions tiresome while visiting big exhibitions
problem_5: Similarly for Exhibitors generating good leads is difficult from huge number of visitors
problem_6: Exhibition specific application to solve such problems available in market but no common solution
problem_7: Tiresome to track relevant exhibitions happening in immediate future
solution_1: Brochure digitisation will save both money and paper
solution_2: Easy to annotate digital brochures, search and find relevant information
solution_3: All data from all exhibitions and booths in a single app suite
solution_4: Allow users to take quick notes, add tags for future reference
solution_5: Allow communication between exhibitor and visitor via the apps
solution_6: Track all present and upcoming exhibitions. Save favorites.

projectCardDescription: POC of Diet Recommendation for Exotic Animals via web app and ChatBot and platform for defining & visualizing complex diet rules.
problem_1: No platform in use to engage with customers
problem_2: No platform to share decades of diet recommendation knowledge with customers
problem_3: Lack of a tool to build, test and visualize complex relationships between different criteria that impact diet recommendation
problem_4: Desire to develop interactive Chatbots for customers but no expertise to do so
problem_5: Difficult to update & track scattered information in form of multiple excel sheets
solution_1: Build a POC to showcase various possible platform ideas
solution_2: Built a diet recommendation for exotic animals chatbot
solution_3: Built a demo web app for similar diet recommendation with premium UI
solution_4: Using mockups showcases ideas to build, test and visualize diet recommendation rules
solution_5: Data import using excel sheets and smart forms to bring all information on a single platform

projectCardDescription: Allowing Nutritionist to manage appointments, build and share diet plans & better connect with patients post clinic visit.
problem_1: Difficult to manage patient appointments, cancellations
problem_3: Proprietary software do not satisfy many custom requirements
problem_4: No way to engage with patients post clinic visit
problem_5: No way to ensure that patients remember to adhere to their diet plans
problem_6: Without a software, lots of repeat work in preparing similar diet plans
solution_1: Build a web based tool for nutritionist and receptionist
solution_2: Receptionist app can manage appointments, cancellations
solution_3: Allowed client to to test features and entertain several custom requests
solution_4: Implemented automated emails & SMS diet reminders for patients
solution_5: Feature to save multiple diet plan templates
solution_6: Dietary information of several food items available at click of a button

projectCardDescription: Search and Book appointments for various speciality Doctors and Hospitals.
problem_1: Lack of a platform for searching specialist doctors/hospitals
problem_2: Lack of a platform for booking appointments with specialist doctors/hospitals
solution_1: A mobile responsive website with city and locality wise search
solution_2: Filter doctors/hospitals based on speciality to curate search results
solution_3: View available slots and book appointment accordingly in a few steps

projectCardDescription: Manage vendor and client orders, payments and billing information digitally, resulting in 10-fold increase in efficiency.
problem_1: Client spent half day everyday to visit merchants to collect order on paper
problem_2: Additional time spend on transferring orders to a notebook, compile and place order with rice mills
problem_4: Difficult to manage order receipt, billing and payments from merchants and to rice mills
problem_5: All information present in notebooks, making it difficult to track and retrieve it
problem_6: Manpower & time wastage in maintaining operational data in an inefficient manner
problem_7: No scope of analytics and removing inefficiencies in operations
solution_1: Mobile app to allow client to take orders remotely
solution_2: Allow client to send orders via the mobile app
solution_3: Allow tracking of order on mobile and web app
solution_4: Use mobile and web app to see order, payments history for merchants and rice mills
solution_5: Simple UX and UI to allow users to begin using the app on Day 1
solution_6: Monitor data on app to give insights to client

projectCardDescription: Platform for managing inward, outward shipments, manufacturing process, inventory, buyer & seller information and integration with billing software.
problem_1: All inward and outward shipment information available in notebooks. Difficult for Client to review
problem_2: Inward shipment processing time huge, having to manage multiple vehicles’ weighing, shipment unloading and noting of shipment details on several different notebooks
problem_3: Difficult to keep track of seller and buyer orders and payments
problem_4: All information present in notebooks, making it difficult to track and retrieve it
problem_5: Manpower & time wastage in maintaining operational data in an inefficient manner
problem_6: Inaccuracies in noting weight values resulting in wrong bill amounts
problem_7: No real-time inventory management, resulting in time and resource mismanagement
problem_8: No scope of analytics and removing inefficiencies in operations
solution_1: Web app to create all inward and outward shipment entries
solution_2: Make all information readily available for Client’s perusal in tabular format with easy search and sort options
solution_3: Easy to track status of various inward and outward shipments with monitoring dashboard
solution_4: Simple UX and UI to allow easy on-boarding of users
solution_5: Integration of web app with weighing machine, to remove possibility of fraud
solution_6: Integration of web app with CCTV to attach images with relevant entries for Client’s perusal
solution_7: Generate bill PDFs for quick print and sharing

projectCardDescription: Manage client assignments, projects, communication and documents. Also, allowing clients to better furnish their information.
problem_1: No tool in use for project management
problem_3: Proprietary software couldn’t cater to Client’s custom requirements
problem_4: Difficult to track and manage documents submitted by customers
problem_5: Improper communication with customers due to lack of transparency
problem_6: Difficult to track work assignment and progress
problem_7: Multiple copies of same document, no version control – leading to misinformation & lots of reworking
solution_1: Web app suite for Client employees and their customers
solution_2: Customers can upload relevant documents on their app which can be viewed and downloaded by Client
solution_3: Client web app allows admin to track work assignment and progress

projectCardDescription: Introduced barcode based authenticity verification system for each individual product unit. Decreased fake products and increased brand value
problem_1: Duplication of product packaging to sell inferior product at high prices
problem_2: Reuse of product bags to sell inferior product hurting Client’s brand image
problem_3: Several low cost anti-counterfeiting solutions implemented, but each one countered by scammers
problem_4: Other anti-counterfeiting options too costly to be implemented for low profit high volume product
solution_1: Barcode and QR code based packaging identification system implemented
solution_3: Simple mobile and web app to verify authenticity of product
solution_4: Implemented complex algorithm to identify reuse of bags
solution_5: Instant alerts to Client when counterfeiting detected

projectCardDescription: Assisted in tracking client applications, documents, and various form filings for new company formation process.
problem_1: No tool in use for document and process management
problem_3: Proprietary software couldn’t cater to Client’s custom requirements
problem_5: Difficult to monitor steps of a complex work pipeline
solution_1: Web app for Client to replicate their work pipeline
solution_2: Document and process steps checklist making easy to track work progress
solution_3: Web app allowed Client to work from anywhere since most of the data is now online

projectCardDescription: Manage operations such as raw material procurement, inspections, labour onboarding of remote construction sites and track daily work progress.
problem_1: No tool in use for project and process management
problem_3: Proprietary software couldn’t cater to Client’s custom requirements
problem_4: Difficult for client to track work progress in remote construction sites
problem_5: Delayed or misinformation resulting in preventable losses
problem_6: Due to improper inventory management, orders get delayed, resulting in major project delays
problem_7: Lack of transparency resulting in inefficient root cause analysis
problem_8: No data to pinpoint and improve operational inefficiencies
solution_1: Combination of web and mobile app with custom features
solution_2: User access control with audit logs to increase transparency
solution_3: Implemented image capturing at various work stages for Client to get authentic work progress daily, weekly and monthly reports
solution_4: Digitisation allowed real time inventory management resulting in lots of hours saved
solution_5: Digitsation resulted in accurate information available at fingertips of all stakeholders

projectCardDescription: An LMS that allowed teachers to create and upload courses, and students to view them and undertake assignments.
Enabled traders to carry on their B2B activities by setting up online store, manage product catalogues & prices, and online procurement.
